publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-558 Tommy Sheridan: Support for the Firefighters-That the Parliament offers full support to Scotland's firefighters who are being denied their full pay settlement and calls on the Scottish Executive to intervene with COSLA to secure implementation of this rise.
S2M-558 Support for the Firefighters (lodged on 4 November 2003) Rosie Kane*
S2M-558 Support for the Firefighters (lodged on 4 November 2003) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Colin Fox*, Ms Sandra White*, Elaine Smith*, Campbell Martin*

S2M-558 Tommy Sheridan: Support for the Firefighters-That the Parliament offers full support to Scotland's firefighters who are being denied their full pay settlement and calls on the Scottish Executive to intervene with COSLA to secure implementation of this rise. Supported by: Rosie Kane, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Colin Fox, Ms Sandra White, Elaine Smith, Campbell Martin, Chris Ballance*
S2M-558 Support for the Firefighters (lodged on 4 November 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-558 Support for the Firefighters (lodged on 4 November 2003) Rob Gibson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-558 Support for the Firefighters (lodged on 4 November 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-558 Support for the Firefighters (lodged on 4 November 2003) Tricia Marwick*
S2M-558 Support for the Firefighters (lodged on 4 November 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
